Message-ID: <8mus0u+abc1@...>

From: "Jason Vorhees" <dcoburn@...>

::Decadel::

       The pod scanners scanned the area for any life forms.  It
found 
various lifeforms, and randomly chose a beast mode from the list. 
The 
pod opened up, and out stepped a tall bot.  His name was Decadel.  He 
looked around the area.  It was sandy all around.  But, there was
some 
vegetation, by a river.  The Nile River.  He had landed in Egypt.  
Decadel was curious about what his beast mode was.  

         "Beast Mode!"

            Decadel's beast mode was....An earthworm!  He wriggled 
around a bit.  Then he went underground and popped up somewhere else. 
 His beast mode mode may not be the most charming, but his stealth 
capabilities were excellent in this form.  He also figured out he had 
a vehicle mode, that could only be used underground.  He went 
underground, and fired his plasma cannons above.  His vehicle mode
was 
perfect for ambushing or taking out bots unseen.  He went back to the 
surface and looked around.

            "Decadel, Terrorize!"

           Yes, you heard him, terrorize!  He was destined to be a 
predacon, but didn't know it.  He still looks at the predacon
insignia 
on his shoulders, and wonders what they mean.  He also wonders why he 
transforms at his name and then the word of "terrorize!".  He
wondered 
around a bit, until he saw a base!  He saw a base!  He saw the 
predacon base, but, he didn't know it was predacon.  He ran up to it 
and observed it.  There must be other bots in there, obviously.  
Friendly or not, he had to check it out.  He went up to the door and 
knocked.  Surprisingly, the outer defences weren't opening assault on 
him.  He knocked on the door again and waited.

                    Decadel
             Beast mode: Earthworm   Vehicle mode: Subterranean Cannon
             Bot mode: Sleek, shiny, brown plating.
             Weapons: bot=two flamethrowers, two shoulder plasma 
cannons and optic lasers.  vehicle=hidden plasma cannons.
             Side: Predacon
             Function: Spy(best), Warrior(average)
